Text:
Um...

This doesn't quite look like it is for a Mac...
Um? What the fuck does "Um" mean? Can't you think before you, um, write?

Get out of the wrong side of bed today, did we sundazed?
It was pretty obvious what he meant (I he was employing "irony") and it is also equally obvious to anyone who has ever had a Mac that a .exe file doesn't work on MacOS.

So THAT'S irony! Oh, hang on... "the expression of one's meaning by using language that normally signifies the opposite, typically for humorous or emphatic effect" ... it's not!

Yawn.
like we are having a phone conversation?! The internet is not a phone. Irony is the you doing the same damn thing that you  complain about. -- moron.
Hey, great! Let's have a slanging match! Why have you signed yourself "moron"? Pursuit of accuracy I suppose.
... and the internet is whatever you want it to be, dickhead (including a phone). But you're right about irony.
Nice to have something to bitch about.
Hey, Sundazed. Stop trying to suck your own dick, it's embarrasing. Gaja: You're a retard. Enzeth: Aren't you the retard who posted demos around here?
